result.execSummary:
The defendant Lemont Gregory was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Retail Theft - Intentionally Take (<=$500), a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.50(1m)(b).
  • Resisting or Obstructing an Officer, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.41(1).
  • Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: $50.00 BAIL APPLIED. Remaining costs to be paid with other counts and DNA surcharge on payment plan at a rate of $25.00 per month commencing 9/01/2015; alternate 6 days.

TIME SERVED.
Consecutive to: Counts 2 and 3

No contact with Pick N Save.
Case 15CM409 was dismissed and read into: 15CM1025.

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: with Elements of criminal offenses to which plea is being entered.

Defendant Lemont Gregory in court, in custody, with attorney Nicole M Masnica.   Shawn N Woller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Defendant enters a plea of no contest to Count 1, 2 and 3,  Court finds defendant guilty.

Court orders the following:
Ct. 1:
- 30 days jail consecutive to Cts. 2 and 3 - TIME SERVED.
- Court costs of $253.00 (includes DRGOD) to be paid at a rate of $25.00 per month commencing 09/01/2015; alternate 6 days jail - Apply Bail
- DNA Surcharge of $200.00  - append to court costs
- No contact with Pick n' Save

Ct.  2:
- 30 days jail consecutive to Cts. 1 and 3 - TIME SERVED.
- Court costs of $243.00 to be paid at a rate of $25.00 per month commencing 09/01/2015; alternate 6 days jail - Apply Bail
- DNA Surcharge of $200.00 waived

Ct. 3:
- 30 days jail consecutive to Cts. 1 and 2 - TIME SERVED.
- Court costs of $243.00 to be paid at a rate of $25.00 per month commencing 09/01/2015; alternate 6 days jail - Apply Bail
- DNA Surcharge of $200.00 waived.

NOTE: DEFENDANT HAS  A TOTAL OF 98 DAYS CREDIT.
From Milwaukee House of Correction for July 24, 2015  for Plea/Sentencing hearing on 07/27/2015 at 9:30 a.m.
Plea/sentencing hearing on July 27, 2015 at 09:30 am.

Attorney Nicole M Masnica in court.   Defendant Lemont Gregory did not appear, appearance waived. Defendant was not present when contacted for his video appearance.   Lesli S Boese appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defense states her client is at Milwaukee House of Correction. Defense requests a date in 30 days for a Plea/Sentencing. Court grants request. Court orders an OTP be prepared for the Defendant.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for July 27, 2015 at 09:30 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Lemont Gregory
Current: 8885 S 68th Street, c/o Milwaukee House of Corrections, Franklin, WI 53132 United States  (Effective: 06-09-2015)
Prior: 3242 N 44th St, Milwaukee, WI 53216
Initial appearance on June 22, 2015 at 11:00 am.

Attorney Nicole M Masnica in court.   Defendant Lemont Gregory did not appear.   Kevin M. Osborne appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant was scheduled to appear by video but video would not connect.  Defendant is currently on a hold in Milwaukee.  Hearing scheduled for June 22, 2015 at 11:00 am.
Waukesha County Pretrial Screening Services Report by Wisconsin Community Services filed.
